name: cloudflare-dns
description: Manage Cloudflare DNS records with apex protection for zurielyahav.com
author: Zuriel Yahav

tools.name: upsert_dns_record
tools.description: Create or update a DNS record. Protected subdomains (@, www, zurielyahav.com) are blocked.

type.description: DNS record type. Only A, CNAME, and TXT are allowed.

content.description: Record content (IP address for A, hostname for CNAME, text for TXT)

proxied.description: Whether to proxy through Cloudflare (ignored for TXT records)

tools.name: delete_dns_record
tools.description: Delete a DNS record. Protected subdomains (@, www, zurielyahav.com) are blocked.

subdomain.description: Subdomain name to delete. Cannot be '@', 'www', or 'zurielyahav.com'.

type.description: Optional: Specify record type to delete if multiple records exist
